thread.title: Ray Joosab

author: Ray Joosab
title: Ray Joosab
text: very easy to book and competitive prices--- however more flexibility should be offered like paying for it in local or any currency when we pick it up, you could take a deposit on credit card or use the credit card to block the payment which can be released after payment is made in currency of our choice. Debit cards should also be permissible as a lot of people do not want to use credit cards due to charges and credit problems...so yes more flexibility in the rental program. The customer will be yours forever..if you keep them happy
